attributes.action: Make the Rebel Social Alliance exempt from paying tax on alcohol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Rebel Social Alliance are 7 Honorary Members with one ethos to promote drunkeness and childish behaviour wherever we go. We believe alcohol costs too much and is stunting the development of the RSA. This is why we ask, ney demand that the RSA gets a special exemption from paying tax on alcohol.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
